title: Diva 1981 PAL XviD FRE multi-sub proper audio OST
description:
Movie: Opera Suspense Thriller Mystery Interracial Romance

-- Here is "Diva", a film which, if you live in Region 1, you haven&#039;t
seen properly except on television or in the theater because the boneheads
who issued the DVD simply slowed down the 25fps film to 23.937fps Hollywood
standard (then applied the usual telecining to produce the 29.97fps DVD).
...which had the unfortunate side-effect of converting a opera tenor into
a baritone.

So...don&#039;t buy any NTSC version of "Diva", or you&#039;ll regret it.

All non-French language dub tracks of this film stink, so I junked them.

Specs: XviD 624x368 (original AR = 1:66), 107kbps VBR lame MP3
Source: PAL DVD; ....OST: 320kbps CBR lame MP3
